text: Hridaya Shanker Singh is the first Vice-Chancellor of Maa Shakumbhari University in Uttar Pradesh.https://msuniversity.ac.in/pdf/unive-doc/Ann-A- for-domain.pdf Before this Prof. Singh retired as a professor from the Zoology Department of Chaudhary Charan Singh University. He has been Pro-Vice- Chancellor, Controller of Examinations at Chaudhary Charan Singh University, and Director at Sir Chhotu Ram Engineering College. == References == Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Indian academics
title: Hridaya Shanker Singh
